name: NetFlow Optimizer - IT Operations and Security Insight
description: The NetFlow Optimizer app provides dashboards to monitor your network traffic in data centers or clouds providing details on inbound/outbound accepted rejected flows, source and destination IP addresses, ports, protocols, as well as usage by application and user. Data is imported into Sumo via JSON streaming of NetFlow Optimizer processing NetFlow, IPFIX, sFlow, and cloud VPC flow logs.

children.name: NetFlow - Flows Allowed and Rejected
children.description: Dashboard monitoring traffic flows in your data center and clouds. It provides details for inbound/outbound traffic as well as accepted/rejected network conversations.
children.title: NetFlow - Flows Allowed and Rejected

panels.title: Top 10 Source IP Accepted
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Source IP (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"table","displayType":"default","paginationPageSize":100,"fontSize":12,"mode":"distribution"}}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where  action="A" 
| concat(src_ip, " (",exp_ip,") ") as Source_IP 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by Source_IP 
| sort by -Flows 
| Limit 10

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="A" 
| sum(flow_count) as flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="A" 
| sum(flow_count) as flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="R" 
| sum(flow_count) as flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="R" 
| sum(flow_count) as flows

panels.title: Top 10 Destination IP Accepted
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Source IP (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"table","displayType":"default","paginationPageSize":100,"fontSize":12,"mode":"distribution"}}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where action="A" 
| concat(dest_ip, " (",exp_ip,") ") as Destination_IP 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by Destination_IP 
| sort by -Flows 
| Limit 10

panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Source IP (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[],"general":{"type":"table","displayType":"default","paginationPageSize":100,"fontSize":12,"mode":"distribution"}}

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}"

| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}"

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where action="R" and protocol=17 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by dest_port 
| sort by -Flows 
| Limit 10

children.name: NetFlow - Security Monitoring - Communications with Malicious Hosts
children.description: Dashboard monitoring threats on your network, categorized by threat feed and reputation. You can view hosts affected by threats and trends over time.
children.title: NetFlow - Security Monitoring - Communications with Malicious Hosts

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where  direction="inbound" and action="A" 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="A" 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="R" 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="R" 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="A" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by _timeslice, Threat 
| transpose row _timeslice column Threat

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="A" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as host_pair 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows, sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd by host_pair, Threat 
| sort -Flows 
| limit 10

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "reputation" "flow_count"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","reputation","flow_count"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}"  
| where direction="inbound" and action="R" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by _timeslice, Threat 
| transpose row _timeslice column Threat

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="A" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as host_pair 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows, sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd  by host_pair, Threat 
| sort -Flows 
| limit 10

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="A" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by _timeslice, Threat 
| transpose row _timeslice column Threat

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="R" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows by _timeslice, Threat 
| transpose row _timeslice column Threat

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="inbound" and action="R" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as host_pair 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows, sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd by host_pair, Threat 
| sort -Flows 
| limit 10

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "threat_list_name" "flow_count" "reputation" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","threat_list_name","flow_count","reputation","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" and action="R" 
| concat(reputation, " (", threat_list_name, ")") as Threat 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as host_pair 
| sum(flow_count) as Flows, sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd by host_pair, Threat 
| sort -Flows 
| limit 10

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "flow_count" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","flow_count","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where action="A" and dest_port=53 and direction="inbound" 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as Host_Pair  
| sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd, sum(flow_count) as Flows by Host_Pair 
| sort by -Bytes_Sent 
| Limit 10

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "action" "direction" "flow_count" "bytes_in" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","action","direction","flow_count","bytes_in","bytes_out"  
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where action="A" and direction="outbound" and lookupContains(path://"/Library/Users/sumo_logic_tap@netflowlogic.com/nfo_lookups/critical_ports",dest_port=dest_port) 
| lookup service from path://"/Library/Users/sumo_logic_tap@netflowlogic.com/nfo_lookups/critical_ports" on dest_port 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip, ":", dest_port, " (", service, ")") as Host_Pair  
| sum(bytes_out) as Bytes_Sent, sum(bytes_in) as Bytes_Rcvd, sum(flow_count) as Flows by Host_Pair 
| sort by -Bytes_Sent 
| Limit 10

children.name: NetFlow - Traffic Overview
children.description: Dashboard monitoring network traffic by volume and host. It provides details for top senders, receivers, protocols, ports, applications, and users.
children.title: NetFlow - Traffic Overview

panels.title: Top Traffic Sending
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Source IP (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_out" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| concat(src_ip, " (",exp_ip,") ") as source_ip 
| sum(bytes_out) as mb by source_ip 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10

panels.title: Top Traffic Conversations
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Client - Server","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_out","bytes_in" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| bytes_in + bytes_out as bytes 
| concat(src_ip," - ", dest_ip) as host_pair  
| sum(bytes) as mb by host_pair 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10

panels.title: Top Traffic Receiving
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Destination IP (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where nfc_id=20062
| concat(dest_ip, " (",exp_ip,") ") as destination_ip 
| sum(bytes_in) as mb by destination_ip 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}"  
| where direction="inbound" 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(bytes_in) as mb by _timeslice, nfo_hostname 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| transpose row _timeslice column nfo_hostname

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="outbound" 
| timeslice 5m 
| sum(bytes_in) as mb by _timeslice, nfo_hostname 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| transpose row _timeslice column nfo_hostname

$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in","bytes_out" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| where direction="internal" 
| timeslice 5m 
| bytes_in + bytes_out as bytes 
| sum(bytes) as mb by _timeslice, nfo_hostname 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| transpose row _timeslice column nfo_hostname

panels.title: Top Traffic Applications
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Application (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "bytes_out"  "20062" "app_name" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in","bytes_out" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| bytes_in + bytes_out as bytes 
| concat(app_name, " (",exp_ip,") ") as app 
| sum(bytes) as mb by app 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10

panels.title: Top Traffic Users
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"User (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "bytes_out"  "20062" "username" 
|  json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in","bytes_out" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| bytes_in + bytes_out as bytes 
| concat(username, " (",exp_ip,") ") as username 
| sum(bytes) as mb by username 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10

panels.title: Top Traffic Protocols
panels.visualSettings: {"series":{},"legend":{"enabled":false,"verticalAlign":"right","fontSize":12,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true,"maxWidth":200},"title":{"fontSize":14},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"Protocol (Exporter)","hideLabels":false,"titleFontSize":9,"labelFontSize":9},"axisY":{"title":"MBytes","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":false,"minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":12,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":12,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","hideLabels":true}},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  "nfc_id" "exp_ip" "src_ip" "dest_ip" "dest_port" "protocol" "bytes_in"  "bytes_out"  "20062" 
| json "nfc_id","exp_ip","src_ip","dest_ip","dest_port","protocol","bytes_in","bytes_out" 
| where nfc_id=20062 AND nfo_hostname matches "{{nfo_hostname}}" AND exp_ip matches "{{exp_ip}}" AND src_ip matches "{{src_ip}}" AND dest_ip matches "{{dest_ip}}" AND dest_port matches "{{dest_port}}" AND protocol matches "{{protocol}}" 
| bytes_in + bytes_out as bytes 
| lookup transport from path://"/Library/Users/sumo_logic_tap@netflowlogic.com/nfo_lookups/netflow_protocols" on protocol 
| concat(transport, " (",exp_ip,") ") as transport 
| sum(bytes) as mb by transport 
| mb/1024/1024 as mb  
| sort by -mb 
| Limit 10
